senses.synonym: 00418656-n (a close and affectionate (and often prolonged) embrace);01427599-v (move or arrange oneself in a comfortable and cozy position; \""We cuddled against each other to keep warm\""; \""The children snuggled into their sleeping bags\"");01428162-v (hold (a person or thing) close, as for affection, comfort, or warmth; \""I cuddled the baby\""
